skills.name: Energy Punch
skills.description: Attacks with a spinning punch and stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 25% chance.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Chain Attack
skills.description: Launches 2 consecutive attacks on an enemy, inflicting damage and decreasing the enemy's Attack Bar by 25% with each attack.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Eye For An Eye (Passive)
skills.description: Attacks the attacker with a critical hit to inflict damage that's proportionate to your Attack Power and Stuns the target for 1 turn with a 40% chance when attacked with a critical hit. Additionally, your Attack Bar increases by 30%. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns
